Shield of Valor

shield (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 152
armor id [armor]: 57 (Shield of Valor)
protection, shield [protshield]: 21
defence [def]: -1
parry [parry]: 8
encumbrance [enc]: 1
air shield [airshield]: 80%

Requires 5E5A to forge (E1A1)

This formidable shield is enchanted with Earth and Air to make it both strong and light. Symbols of power are inscribed on the surface of the shield to protect the bearer from missiles.
